ygData.subject: Re: Denied Access?
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as I know you can t be denied to this mailing group, when I advertised the list I even turned off the moderated flag, which means I don t even need to
ygData.messageBody:
As far as I know you can't be denied to this mailing group, when I
advertised the list I even turned off the moderated flag, which means I
don't even need to approve/deny subscribers now, everyone is invited,
though I CAN boot offensive people.. :)

- Avron Vallengard -


On 13 Apr 1999 FKRUEGER@... wrote:

> From: FKRUEGER@...
>
> I received a notification that I was denied access to this group. You got something against half elves, or something against rangers? What's going on?
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> To unsubscribe from this mailing list, or to change your subscription
> to digest, go to the ONElist web site, at http://www.onelist.com and
> select the Member Center link from the menu bar on the left.
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
>
